The username used to log in to the student\'s school\'s School Loop web portal.
The password used to log in to the student\'s school\'s School Loop web portal.

The School Loop site prefix is the first part of the student\'s School Loop website URL. For example, for Monta Vista High School, the URL is \"montavista.schoolloop.com\", so the prefix should be \'montavista\'. In general, the prefix should be the * part of \"*.schoolloop.com\".
No grades have been entered for this course
